400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The server cannot process the request due to a client error.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: The server understood the request, but refuses to authorize it.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource could not be found.

409.title: Conflict
409.message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

415.title: Unsupported Media Type
415.message: The server does not support the media type transmitted in the request.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overload or maintenance.

201.title: Created
201.message: The request has been fulfilled and has resulted in one or more new resources being created.

204.title: No Content
204.message: The server successfully processed the request and is not returning any content.
